changes.change: Added an option to update note links after copying notes.
Cleanup YXBJ accounts which fail to sync on Android devices after using NoteDup.
Fix the issue that the copied notes cannot be synced on Android devices
新功能：完成笔记复制后自动更新笔记链接。
新功能：修复因使用之前版本NodeDup导入数据导致的Android设备无法同步帐户的问题。
修复：某些笔记复制到印象笔记帐户导致该帐户无法在Android设备上同步。
Fix the issue of account authentication
skip creating empty notebooks or tags in target account
add status information of master thread
handle the cases where network is not available
Fix a bug when notebooks/tags already exist with different letter cases
